(Start with below comment) monkey brain still has pussy and no pussy has been lost to a competitor. And that, vanilla fags, is why reverse/m:ntr is deemed "ok" by the average male psyche while regular/f:ntr is not. Moral fags might not like it, but it's the truth. Yes, I hit the character limit.

Damn this feels like a real hidden gem boys. Also to the retards down there saying f:ntr and m:ntr are the same thing, you are braindead. I'll beat my dick to just about anything including both types of ntr, but they are very different from each other. I'd bet at least 99.99% of people getting off to hentai are dudes, so for all intents and purposes the male perspective is the only one that matters here. With that said, they are different because your monkey brain is always gonna self-insert into the hentai to some degree and will get upset when another dude is stealing a female (valuable resource to monkey brain) from the protagonist the author positions for us to identify with (this is a bad feeling, but some people get off to that). With reverse ntr/m:ntr, we are still identifying with the male protagonist, but no valuable resources are being lost in that situation, they're just being shuffled around, and this does not bother monkey brain, because (see above comment)
